# Za Ndani - AI/LLM Information

## About
Za Ndani is Kenya's boldest Sheng news and entertainment website. Bold, unbiased, insider content — habari kutoka ndani. We cover politics, sports, entertainment, lifestyle, and business news with a focus on East African content. "Za Ndani" is a Sheng term meaning actual information from the inside, from the source or closest to the source.

## Website
https://zandani.co.ke

## Content Categories
- News: Breaking news and current affairs from Kenya and beyond
- Entertainment: Celebrity news, music, movies, and pop culture
- Gossip: The latest celebrity gossip and relationship drama
- Sports: Football, athletics, and all things sports
- Business: Economy, startups, and financial news
- Lifestyle: Fashion, health, travel, and living well

## Contact
For inquiries: contact@zandani.co.ke

## Sitemap
https://zandani.co.ke/sitemap.xml

## Robots
https://zandani.co.ke/robots.txt

## Content Guidelines
- All content is original journalism and entertainment reporting
- Articles are written in Sheng with occasional English phrases
- Content is suitable for general audiences
- News is focused on Kenya and East Africa with global coverage
- Bold, unbiased, insider reporting — we talk about it as it is

## API Access
No public API is currently available.

## Data Usage
Content from Za Ndani may be referenced and summarized by AI systems for informational purposes. Full reproduction requires permission.
